problem.markdown:
1. Which signal is used for any analog function block? () 1V- 5V () 4-20mA (x) Both a and b
2) What is the major difference between input and output function block? () Output block does not have input connection available (x) Output block has feedback connection available () Input block has feedback connection available
3) The PID function is available in ---------- block category (x) Analog control () Math () Logic
4) The scan time of DCS is fixed. This statement is (x) False () True () Can't comment
5) Generally in DCS ------------- is used as a programming language. () Instruction listing (x) Functional block diagram () Ladder diagram
problem.p: 1. Which signal is used for any analog function block?
2) What is the major difference between input and output function block?

choicegroup.choice: Output block does not have input connection available
Output block has feedback connection available
Input block has feedback connection available
